summary: Completed comprehensive testing of W3Champions Match Scout application. Backend API endpoints working correctly with W3Champions integration. Frontend UI fully functional with proper validation and user experience. Fixed MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in match-history endpoint.

fixed_bugs.issue: MongoDB ObjectId not JSON serializable causing 500 error
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Convert ObjectId to string before JSON response

passed_tests: Check-match endpoint with valid player data
Race validation (Human, Orc, Night Elf, Undead, Random)
Professional UI design with gradient background
